home.title: Home | Dain's Place
home.description: Welcome to the best neighborhood bar in Durham! Located on 9th Street, we're serving up fantastic pub fare - from juicy burgers to crispy tater tots to ice cold craft beers and refreshing cocktails. Pull up a stool and make Dain's Place your place!

about.title: About | Dain's Place
about.description: Discover the story behind Dain's Place, your favorite neighborhood pub in Durham, NC. From baby Dain's hospitality dreams to becoming a local institution, we’re proud to sling our delicious burgers and frosty brews to Durhamites, Dukies, and visitors with a smile (and a wise crack if we really like ya). Get to know our team and learn about our commitment to quality, comfort, and community.

location.title: Hours & Location | Dain's Place
location.description: Visit Dain’s Place in Durham, NC! Find our location and hours of operation. Whether you’re craving a juicy burger, cold beer, or late-night cocktails, we’re ready to serve you seven days a week. See you soon at the best neighborhood bar in town!

contact.title: Contact | Dain's Place
contact.description: Get in touch with Dain’s Place! Have a question or comment? Use our simple contact form to send us a message, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. We’re always here to help!

menu.title: Menu | Dain's Place
menu.description: Voted best burger in Durham year after year, Dain's serves fresh, never frozen, 100% black angus beef, the best cheesesteak you'll find outside of Philly, killer kosher all-beef hotdogs, housemade mozzarella trianges, cheesy perogies, crispy tater tots, golden fries and more. Even our salad is a banger!

faqs.title: FAQs | Dain's Place
faqs.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions at Dain's Place. Learn about our menu, ingredients, private events, and more. Everything you need to know before your visit is right here!
